Package com.idibon.api.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DocumentContent
    Common methods for interacting with various types of document content that is stored by the API.
    DocumentContent.Annotated
    Interface implemented by documents that have annotation data.
    DocumentContent.Named
    Interface implemented by documents that have a known name.
    Prediction<T extends Prediction>
    Common super-interface for any type (e.g., document vs span scope) of prediction API result.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Annotation
    An Annotation represents an annotation on a Document.
    Annotation.Assignment
    An Assignment annotation.
    Annotation.DocumentAssignment
    Simple marker subclass for Assignments that classify an entire Document.
    Annotation.Judgment
    A Judgment annotation.
    Annotation.SpanAssignment
    Classfies a region of text (a span) within a Document.
    AnnotationBuilder<T extends Annotation>
    Class used to create new or update existing annotations.
    AnnotationBuilder.Assignment
    Builder for constructing Assignment Annotation instances
    AnnotationBuilder.Judgment
    Builder for constructing Judgment Annotation instances.
    APIFailure<T>
    The APIFailure represents a failed API request, such as a document or annotation upload, containing the item(s) in the failed request and the error itself.
    Collection
    The Collection is the top-most item in an analysis project.
    Document
    A Document is the basic unit of content in a Collection
    DocumentAnnotationQuery
    Builder for document searches by annotation properties.
    DocumentPrediction
    Document classification prediction results.
    DocumentSearcher
    Class for searching for Documents in a Collection by text, date, annotation features, or other aspects, and then iterating over the results.
    IdibonHash
    Base class for all data model objects that are loadable via direct HTTP GET operations from the Idibon API.
    Label
    A label (classification / type of data) inside a Task.
    LabelBuilder
    The LabelBuilder is used to create new or update existing labels in the API.
    PredictionIterable<T extends Prediction>
    Generates predictions for one or more predictable items.
    SpanPrediction
    Prediction results for span-scope tasks.
    Task
    A machine learning task inside a Collection.
    TaskBuilder
    The TaskBuilder is used to create new or update existing tasks in the API.
    TuningRules
    Enables applications to configure tuning rules (a.k.a., tuning dictionaries) on a task.
    TuningRules.Rule
    An individual rule (for a specific Label in the tuning dictionary.
    TuningRules.Rule.Regex
    A rule that matches regular expressions.
    TuningRules.Rule.Substring
    A rule that will matches exact substrings.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Annotation.Keys
    Keys in the annotation JSON hash.
    Annotation.Provenance
    The annotation provenance describes how the annotation was created; either as a process of direct human interaction, indirectly from multiple human annotations, or automatically by a predictive agent.
    AnnotationBuilder.Assignment.Status
    Controls the assignment's status and is_trainable fields.
    Collection.Keys
    Keys that may appear in the raw JSON hash.
    Document.Keys
    Keys in the JSON hash.
    DocumentSearcher.ReturnData
    Types of data that can be returned in various search modes.
    DocumentSearcher.Sort
    Result sort order options.
    Label.Keys
    Keys that may be present in a Label JSON.
    Task.Keys
    Keys that may be present in a Task JSON.
    Task.Scope
    All tasks have a scope, which defines the type of predictive analytics that the task will be annotated and trained to perform.
